website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable, bargain-priced, unisex adult life jacket, suitable for light use.
pros: This life jacket is lightweight and adjustable
Can accommodate adults ranging from 80 to 220 pounds
Takes about 10 seconds to fully inflate this jacket by mouth
When folded down, it is about the size of a hardback book
cons: The straps are a little short
If you have a larger build, this might not be the best option for you

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review until I used it but am pleased to say that I am very happy. It was very inexpensive and some reviews raised concerns. The vest itself was of good quality. Others mentioned a failure to get the proper straps (specifically missing the crotch strap) but I got everything I think I needed. I definitely would be unhappy without the crotch strap. I am 6'4" and the straps are long enough for me to use comfortably. I would do it again and will probably get one for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hericks

customer_reviews.title: Works great to keep you afloat
customer_reviews.text: Bright color, easy inflation and deflation, can swim much longer without worrying
customer_reviews.author: greenpeace

customer_reviews.title: Very recommendable!
customer_reviews.text: Before of all I want to thank to customer service because in my order two of my lifejackets were damaged, and asked them for a new replacement and they attended me very kind and replace them for a new pair of lifejackets. The lifejackets are very easy to use and very comfortable to swimming. The thing that I liked of this lifejackets is when you're not using them you can easily keep them in their net bag for the next use because it doesn't need many space. Other people asked me where I bought the lifejackets. So I recommend them for easy use, secure for swimming and good sizes for kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: Melyce

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: bought 4 for a trip to Cozumel and they worked fantastic! No problems and nice to have a little bag to store them in when we were done. Gives just enough rest when needed. Helped my 16 yr old who got caught in a rip current w/o fins.
customer_reviews.author: Adventure A. Waits

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Just what the wife needed. Old school type bc. Well made and was reliable for trip giving extra boyancy and security without inhibiting swimming
customer_reviews.author: happy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: Used these while vacationing. Met and exceeded my expectations. Awesome for snorkeling. Easy to fold and store in luggage, easy to use and good quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: rayros215

customer_reviews.title: bad quality
customer_reviews.text: poor quality, fabric didn't last more than five days, money waste
customer_reviews.author: iruales

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great VestGood quality, folds up nicely to fit in a suitcase for travel.Easy to use and made snorkeling a breeze. It was so nice to be able to float along or even dive a few feet below the surface without any effort at all.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved this while snorkeling in St
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this while snorkeling in St. Lucia. I weigh about 155 and it gave me just the buoyancy I needed since I'm not a good swimmer and gave me confidence to explore without my husband by my side all the time.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to transport, easy to inflate, very buoyant and certainly very visible.This packed really well, folding down quite small .Easy to blow up and was easy to adjust,First,i wear it through crotch,it feel uncomfortable and easy to rollover when there are comes the waves.Then i asked the seller and follow the method.THE SHOULDER STRAP THROUGH ARMPIT,it take effective,and really work grate.Like this snorkel vest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great vest! Good visibility
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vest! Good visibility, comfortable, easy to wear and operate. It is secured in place by a waist and crotch strap. I have not had to clean it, so I can't comment on that. It does tend to "ride up" while snorkeling, but no more so, I suspect, than any other vest of this type.
customer_reviews.author: GriffinTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: it was very easy to use and the fabric is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. As a beginner at age 60, it was very easy to use and the fabric is comfortable. The bright color makes me feel at ease that my family can easily spot me in the water. Light weight and easily packs. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sue O.

customer_reviews.title: Poor product quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last week and took it to a snorkeling beach. I blew it up 3x and thought I was doing something wrong with the valve because it wasn’t holding air. Then I saw the hole. I just tossed it in the trash - what a waste!
customer_reviews.author: nikkiw

customer_reviews.title: Snorkeling Vest
customer_reviews.text: So long as you adjust the straps properly, this works as intended. Wish it was a true pdf because I love that there is no interference with your back, but it's not...so it's not a legal pdf in Florida for kayaking/boating. Having said that, it wasn't advertised as such, so I can't complain...it works okay for it's intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jwranch

customer_reviews.title: Holes in many seams after 2 years.  Purchase June 1, 2018 and only used them 9 times, light use.
customer_reviews.text: Holes in many of the seams after 2 years. Purchase June 1, 2018 and only used them 9 times, light use. Very concerning. Not something you can have happen while in deep open water. Also sand would at times get lodged in the blow tube and had to work it free. But NOT the reason for the seam leaks. Happened in both that I purchased. And if used in salt water. I cleaned well with fresh water. Does anyone know of a brand that lasts much longer?
customer_reviews.author: Brian Watson

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice, works well!
customer_reviews.text: Used it in quite rough water, snorkeling in Mexico, it worked so well, lent the other one to an elderly lady it worked perfectly for her too. Easy to inflate and deflate. Lightweight. With the strap through your legs it won’t ride up. Easy to add air while in the water
customer_reviews.author: J H

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it's suppose to do - help you float. We go on snorkeling trips at least once a year. I love that is inflatable. I can inflate as much as needed. It's nice to keep you floating for a long period of time while snorkeling. However, if I want to swim deeper, I can deflate as needed. Plus, it's easy to pack in my suitcase!
customer_reviews.author: ari002

customer_reviews.title: Great for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great product. Very lightweight and easy to use. Worked great when I was snorkeling. It looks like most of the other people at the beach had these same ones. The only issue I had was sometimes the strap between my legs rode up and was slightly uncomfortable. With an adjustment it was fine. Good thing to have for choppy water.
customer_reviews.author: DMSY

customer_reviews.title: Short straps makes this large vest unusable for USA size large and up.
customer_reviews.text: Although this vest has the largest dimensions, the straps are way too short. I'd guess they will fit no larger than a US medium, if that. Other than that, the vest seems nicely made. I'd guess they need another 18 inches in the crotch and 8-10 around the waist.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for my pre-teen kids while snorkeling on our cruise. They aren't very good swimmers but managed to snorkel for hours using these vests. Prior to going I was nervous about them going snorkeling, but once I saw how well these worked I was able to relax and enjoy the snorkeling myself. I wouldn't use it as a life vest, but they were perfect for giving some buoyancy and allowed the kids to snorkel without getting tired.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B

customer_reviews.title: Great for snorkeling!! Gives an extra feeling of security while snorkeling!
customer_reviews.text: Love these vests! 1st bought one for me, then one for my husband. Ideal for snorkeling. You can control the amount of air in the vest. Gives an extra feeling of security while snorkeling. Especially when ocean is wavy and you get tired, you can just relax and ride the waves.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Too small for adults
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these snorkel vests. One for myself and my teen daughter to share and one for my 11 year old son. The vest fit my son but not me or my daughter. The straps were way to small. I would not recommend these for an adult but for a child they worked great. They fit him well and was easy to inflate and deflate.
customer_reviews.author: Michele M.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Space saving solution for vacation. Easy to inflate. Bright color. I bought two from different brands. Good concepts and both worked well.
customer_reviews.author: YY

customer_reviews.title: Not the best vest I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Kept me afloat while snorkeling. Not the best vest I've ever used, but definitely does the job. The only complaint I have is that it didn't really stay in place like some of the others I've been offered on different snorkel trips I've taken. It seemed to keep wanting to ride up around my neck to the point that I had to really tighten down the straps. It's possible I was doing something wrong, but either way, it did what I needed it to do in the end and I felt way more comfortable with this than what was being provided on our trip in Belize, so in the end, I was glad to have it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Passantino

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product easy to carry when traveling easy to inflate and it hold air well while snorkeling
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am a poor swimmer but love to snorkel in the sea
customer_reviews.text: I am a poor swimmer but love to snorkel in the sea. So when i start getting tired, I put air in this bad boy and it helps!!!! when you take the air out then you can dive down.... I always take this with me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't last
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted a month. Just miss my return window time. One has a leak somewhere and the other one will no longer inflate. Disappointed, started off happy but not anymore.

customer_reviews.title: I used this in the Caribbean and loved to be able to snorkel out a long ways ...
customer_reviews.text: Took me about 3 minutes to figure out that you have to push the valve down to blow air into it. I used this in the Caribbean and loved to be able to snorkel out a long ways and back without have to excerpt my energy to stay afloat.

The blow valve is easy to use and deflates with no complications. My girlfriend doesn't know how to swim in ocean water, but this jacket was the key to making her comfortable and relax.

customer_reviews.title: Great way to help with my snorkeling in open water ...
customer_reviews.text: Great way to help with my snorkeling in open water as I’m a weak swimmer. The fit is perfect and the wrap under your crotch helps pull the float down as you snorkel. Very light and thin to pack with your trip easily. Highly recommended!!!

customer_reviews.text: I don't really like the cap on top of the air tube. Other than that, it seems fine.

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. I received it within a week. The straps are long enough to fit around my body. I'm 5'4" and 180lbs. The valve is easy to inflate and deflate. I'm excited to use it on my upcoming trip. I also ordered a child vest for my daughter.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My friend is in the heavy size, so the belt needs to be longer. It also rubs in her neck. So weight is a factor, but waist size should also be consider.

customer_reviews.title: Don't go snorkeling without it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have. Without it, I nearly drowned in 2-4 ft waves. I jumped in the water without having inflated it. With it, I stayed afloat with no issues whatsoever. Remember to inflate it BEFORE jumping in the water.

customer_reviews.title: Easily packed and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Easily packed away, easy to inflate and was comfortable. I'm 5' 11" 200 lbs and mine couldn't be any smaller but still fit well with the straps adjusted all the way out. For the travel snorkelers these are an inexpensive way to go.

customer_reviews.title: Not sized for adults or teens.  Kids only.
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these and sent all three back. This will not fit any adult from North America. My 13 year old son, who weighs 100 pounds couldn't wear it. The straps are too short. You'd need to snorkel while laying in the fetal position in order to fasten the "through the crotch" buckle.

customer_reviews.text: Nice looking item. Seems sturdily constructed. However, although I'm not THAT big of a guy. 6', 220 lbs, 38" waist. Crotch strap is a tad short, as is the waist. A touch small. Front comes down to the top of my stomach.

customer_reviews.text: It was the perfect snorkel vest. I purchased one for myself and one for my husband. The straps are long enough to fit almost anyone and are easily adjusted. Easy to inflate and deflate for packing. They took up little space in our suitcases and were comfortable to wear.

customer_reviews.text: I cannot find a better Life Jack Vest than it. It is very stable, that is important for Life Vest. What's more, it is comfortable to wear it. As long as you buy it, you have no reason to refuse to put it on. An excellent insurance for your life. Hah

product_meta.title: Rrtizan Adult Inflatable Snorkel Vest Portable Life Jacket for Swimming Safety
feature_bullets: Fast inflation & deflation: ordinarily it only need 15 seconds fully inflated The snorkel vest with your Mouth. When start getting tired, inflated it, keep you floating for a rest. Deflated the vest then you can dive down. So convenient for snorkeling
Make snorkeling much easier: This inflatable vest provides enough buoyancy while snorkeling, give you more confidence to explore in the water, both great for learners and good swimmer
Lightweight & easy to pack: when deflated, just a book size, would not take up your luggage space, net bag easy for you store and you no long pay the expensive rent price for snorkel vest

Adjustable waist & crotch straps: adjust the length through the buckle according to your weight and height, Keep you in peace while snorkeling, usually, this inflatable life vest suitable for 80-220 lbs

Material: outer fayer of durable canvas material, the composite Storey strength PVC membrane, comfortable and enjoyable, The bright colors provide excellent visibility, give you best experience while swimming
